mapper.select: SELECT A.WORK_SQ AS workSq, A.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq, B.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq, C.BID_CNT AS bidCnt, A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL AS workMainImgUrl, A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM AS artstEnglsNm, A.WORK_MATRL AS workMatrl, A.WORK_NM AS workNm, A.WORK_SIZE_WIDTH AS workSizeWidth, A.WORK_SIZE_DEPTH AS workSizeDepth, A.WORK_SIZE_HEIGHT AS workSizeHeight, A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR AS workProdcYear, D.MAX_BID_PRC AS maxBidPrc FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M AS A, TBL_DA_DEAL_M AS B, (SELECT DEAL_SQ , COUNT(DEAL_SQ) AS BID_CNT FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H GROUP BY DEAL_SQ ORDER BY BID_CNT DESC LIMIT 20) AS C, (SELECT DEAL_SQ, MAX(BID_PRC) AS MAX_BID_PRC FROM TBL_DA_AUCTN_BID_H GROUP BY DEAL_SQ LIMIT 20) AS D WHERE B.DEAL_SQ = C.DEAL_SQ AND A.WORK_SQ = B.WORK_SQ AND D.DEAL_SQ = B.DEAL_SQ AND A.MBR_SQ = B.MBR_SQ AND B.DEAL_STTS_CD = 'AUCTN_DEAL_STTS_01' ORDER BY C.BID_CNT DESC;

SELECT A.WORK_SQ AS workSq, A.MBR_SQ AS mbrSq, B.DEAL_SQ AS dealSq, A.WORK_MAIN_IMG_URL AS workMainImgUrl, A.ARTST_ACTVTY_NM AS artstActvtyNm, A.ARTST_ENGLS_NM AS artstEnglsNm, A.WORK_MATRL AS workMatrl, A.WORK_NM AS workNm, A.WORK_SIZE_WIDTH AS workSizeWidth, A.WORK_SIZE_DEPTH AS workSizeDepth, A.WORK_SIZE_HEIGHT AS workSizeHeight, A.WORK_PRODC_YEAR AS workProdcYear, B.DEAL_SBID_PRC AS dealSbidPrc, B.DEAL_ENDNG_DATE AS dealEndngDate FROM TBL_DA_WORK_M A, TBL_DA_DEAL_M B WHERE B.DEAL_STTS_CD IN ('AUCTN_DEAL_STTS_02', 'AUCTN_DEAL_STTS_03', 'AUCTN_DEAL_STTS_04')
AND B.WORK_SQ = A.WORK_SQ;
